func raiseFileNotFoundError(fp: PathLike; err: OSErrorCode)
under Windows, both ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND and ERROR_PATH_NOT_FOUND lead to FileNotFoundError, at pass err to distinguish them Source   Edit
